news_header: A wildfire in Ventura County, California, is raging out of control, forcing thousands to evacuate and causing injuries.
news_text: A wildfire fueled by winds up to 80mph is burning uncontrollably in Ventura County, California. The fire, first reported near Moorpark, has spread to Camarillo, displacing thousands and injuring several. Fire Chief Dustin Gardner described the fire's rapid destruction of vegetation and structures.
